summary: Provides a test suite that validates Kubernetes YAML manifests against a comprehensive set of security policies, checking for risky configurations such as privilege escalation, excessive capabilities, impersonation rights, unauthorized service changes, node/pod execution, public exposure, secret leakage, missing network policies, and improper role bindings.
business_intent: To enforce security best practices and compliance in Kubernetes deployments by automatically detecting and preventing insecure configuration patterns in YAML files.
